TopicTitle: F-15 (A kerbal's first replica and post with plane download)

Articles.Content:
Hey Folks,

I mainly enjoy the space plane aspect of the game. Here is the replica of the F-15 Eagle that I made. It flys extremely well, even so far as to be flyable at x4 speed. I didn't airhog it, so the replica is only capable of about 12k to 15k meters and it only makes that if you are careful. It can, however, fly supersonic. I'm willing to share the file for it if people want it, but I have to figure out how to do that first. A link for the plane download is under the pics.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/f-15-eagle/

Hope you Enjoy

Edited November 6, 2013 by barrenwaste
I wanted to give people more info about the plane.

Looks nice!

Oh, and welcome to the forums.

To share a craft file, you can upload it to dropbox/mediafire/spaceport and then link to it in a post.

-Ojimak

I can give more precise instructions if necessary.
